member.name: M:Autodesk.DataManagement.Client.Framework.Vault.Forms.Library.AcquireFiles(Autodesk.DataManagement.Client.Framework.Vault.Forms.Settings.ProgressAcquireFilesSettings)
member.summary: Downloads and/or checks out files from the vault with a modal progress dialog that is displayed during the operation
member.returns: An object describing the results of each file that was acted on.
member.param: The settings which determine the files to operate on and other options which determine how to handle the files with regards to fixing broken references, overriding existing files on disk, etc. The settings also contain delegates where custom handlers for progress and restrictions can be plugged in. If the settings are InteractiveAcquireFilesSettings, a dialog box will display that allows the user to modify and customize the file acquisition settings.

member.name: M:Autodesk.DataManagement.Client.Framework.Vault.Forms.Library.AcquireFilesAsync(Autodesk.DataManagement.Client.Framework.Vault.Forms.Settings.ProgressAcquireFilesSettings)
member.summary: Asynchronously downloads and/or checks out files from the vault with a modeless progress dialog that is displayed during the operation
member.returns: A Task which represents the background thread that is performing the operation. When the thread is complete, the task will contian the results of each file that was acted on.
member.param: The settings which determing the files to operate on and other options which determine how to handle the files with regards to fixing broken references, overriding existing files on disk, etc. The settings also contain delegates where custom handlers for progress and restrictions can be plugged in.
